properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 8 at 4:45AM CST until February 9 at 11:32PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Alabama...

Catoma Creek Near The U.S. 331 Highway Bridge Affecting Montgomery
County.

.Rises continue along the Catoma Creek following recent rainfall...
and a flood warning is now in effect for the Catoma Creek near
the U.S. 331 Highway Bridge.

The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Catoma Creek Near The U.S. 331 Highway Bridge.
* until Sunday evening...or until the warning is cancelled.
* At  4:00 AM Saturday The stage Was 20.6 feet.
* Flood stage is 20.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 21.9 feet by this
evening. The river will fall below flood stage tomorrow late
morning .
* Impact...At 20.0 feet...Flooding of agricultural lands in the
vicinity of the U.S. 331 Highway Bridge occurs.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Saturday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
